title.rendered: Day 4. BERRY BEACHY & PAPI SWIM – Miami Swim Week

content.rendered:
Miami Swim Week Powered by Art Hearts Fashion Day 4. 

24Fashion TV Exclusive: 

BERRY BEACHY & PAPI SWIM

BERRY BEACHY & PAPI SWIM elicited cheers from the crowd with their size-inclusive collections, featuring vibrant prints and perfect cuts.

BERRY BEACHY & PAPI SWIM Behind BERRY BEACHY & PAPI SWIM are Melanie & Robert, both born and raised in Miami, FL. Their mission with BERRY BEACHY is to embrace the effortless beauty of all women around the world. They believe all women deserve to

feel Beautiful, Confident & Sexy. BERRY BEACHY is known for vibrant prints & quality fabrics which are cut to perfection. WEAR WITH CONFIDENCE

With PAPI SWIM, Melanie and Robert noticed a gap in the world of men's swimwear and a need for improvement. They realized designers were failing to account for the many varied shapes and sizes of men. By offering Quality 4-way stretch shorts from sizes Small to XX-Large, PAPI SWIM swim shorts can fit men of all sizes with comfort in mind. The brand offers fashion forward prints in 2 lengths to choose from: 5.5" and 7.5" so each man can express his unique sense of style. EVERYBODY HAS A PAPI BODY BERRY BEACHY & PAPI SWIM also offer matching prints online. Designer: Melanie Gonzalez and Robert Gonzalez @berrybeachyswimwear @papiswim www.berrybeachyswimwear.com

Photo by Natalie Svors. Exclusively for 24Fashion TV.
